content.text: The final Elements video from my shoot with Dr Andrea Sella takes a look at iodine, an element with many different guises. I could have spent all day filming the smoking purple iodine, it was quite beautiful. Elements presents a world of immersive chemical performance, ingestion, activity and intrigue across all four floors of Wellcome […]

The final Elements video from my shoot with Dr Andrea Sella takes a look at iodine, an element with many different guises. I could have spent all day filming the smoking purple iodine, it was quite beautiful.
Elements presents a world of immersive chemical performance, ingestion, activity and intrigue across all four floors of Wellcome Collection on Friday 8 April, 19.00â€“23.00.
